Package bll

Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
bll.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL extends Object
OrderBLL is responsible for the business logic involving orders.

    • createOrder

      public String createOrder(int clientId, int productId, int quantity) throws IOException
      Creates a new order entity and saves its data.
      Parameters:
      clientId - is the identifier of the client who sent the order.
      productId - is the identifier of the ordered product.
      quantity - represents the ordered quantity.
      Throws:
      IOException
